solution_line_template: To make 1 lei, Jaynie will need {plumeria_per_lei_dozen} x {flowers_per_dozen} = <<{flowers_per_dozen}*{plumeria_per_lei_dozen}={flowers_per_lei}>>{flowers_per_lei} plumeria flowers.
To make {num_leis} leis, she will need to pick {flowers_per_lei} x {num_leis} = <<{flowers_per_lei}*{num_leis}={total_flowers}>>{total_flowers} plumeria flowers from the trees.
